title: Spacious 2BR+ Den/1BA Apt in Lower Pac Heights!
posting_body: Please Email Your Information to Schedule a Private Virtual OR Self-Guided Viewing:
Pictures are representative of apartment finishes and may not be the actual unit***
Your Availability to View the apartment: 2 different times and dates
If you meet the required qualifications of having a credit score of 680+ and stable, verifiable income of 3x the rent
Reference Number 701.1201.3122 - AVAILABLE NOW!******1BR+ 2 Den/1 BA
Application Fee - $50 per applicant for credit screening
- Remodeled Bathroom features a shower/tub combo and modern vanity.
- Saturday Farmer's Market, Safeway, Nijiya Market, Jai Ho Indian Grocery Store, Starbucks around the corner
- 6 minute drive to Trader Joe's, City Center of SF:
- Amazing restaurants, cafes, bars are steps away--State Bird Provisions, Social Study, I'a Poke, Boba Guys, Paina, Marufuku Ramen, Hinodaya Ramen etc.
- Walking distance to Fillmore Street & Japan Town
- Easy Access to Downtown/Financial District/ SOMA
As you search our community for an apartment that's just right for you, keep in mind that promotional leasing offers and special discounts can change quickly based on availability.
We're coordinating self-guided tours OR virtual tours by appointment only**
